title: Lagging really hard with low ping and 120 fps
body: So earlier today I was playing league fine with no lag what so ever and just now I played a game with 40-60 ping and 120 fps but was lagging the whole time. I was playing varus and half of q's wouldn't even go off and it took me 5 seconds every time i changed a moving direction. Also as a side note, my team (who all went super negative) blamed the whole lose of the game on me even though I didn't die, got a kill, and few assists. Did i contribute to the lose, yes. Was it intentional, no. Could we have won that game, not even close. Also when I said I was lagging my talon said "zero deaths and you're lagging, yea sure", so I have to die before I can claim lag? That being said, **is there anyway to fix this lag with low ping and high fps**

replies.body:
It sounds like you may be experiencing some nasty bursts of [*Packet Loss*](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Packet_loss), which typically occurs if there are issues between your PC and our servers. I'd like you to work through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as your next step so we can ensure your local network settings are compatible with League.

If you encounter further issues with this, we can troubleshoot further.
